name: Vulcan Forged
introduce: Vulcan Forged is a community-based blockchain gaming ecosystem that operate a NFT game studio, marketplace, and dApp incubator. The project aims to support the creation of blockchain games through incubation programs and crowdfunding. Vulcan Forged is the creator of VulcanVerse, an open-world massive multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) .
